item.title: Video Effects and Editing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a Video Effects and Editing Specialist to join our team for a game development tutorial and information channel. This job is creating visually appealing video effects and editing tutorial videos to make sure our viewers have a great experience.

Videos will be a mix of game development tutorials which require fairly straight forward edits, editing together the screen capture and the voice over. There will also be much more creative videos that will require creating graphics and images with AI and then creating effects like parallax, smoke, lights, etc. and adding sound. These videos will be game ideas videos where we provide a script and voice over of game ideas and you'll be responsible for bringing those videos to life.

Responsibilities:
- Edit together the raw screen recordings and the voice over.
- Edit and polish the tutorial videos to make them seamless and engaging
- Create AI images and bring them to life.
- Add music and sound effects using the ones available within the YouTube Studio audio library.

Requirements:
- Proficient in video effects, animations, and editing software like Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro
- Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work on time
- Good communication and collaboration skills
- Previous experience creating tutorial videos or working in the game development industry is a plus

Looking forward to working with you!


Posted On: June 21, 2024 10:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Food Videographer for Engaging Cooking Reels and Food Photography - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a food videographer who can create awesome cooking videos and beautiful food photos for our brand, The Skillful Cook. As a food videographer, your job will be to capture and edit engaging reels and photos that show off our recipes. We want someone who has a passion for food, pays attention to the little things, and can make our recipes come alive through visuals.

Apply if you want your work to be showcased to thousands of our monthly readers!

Requirements:
- Food videography skills
- Photography skills (DSLR not required so long as you can capture beautiful shots with your phone)
- Video editing skills
- Ability to tell stories through visuals
- Attention to detail
- Ability to cook dishes containing animal-based products, including pork

You get extra points if you can:
- Develop recipes
- Create voiceovers for reels

Benefits:
- Consistent workload. We aim to create 8-10 recipes per month
- Flexible schedule
- Be a part of an up-and-coming food brand!

Please start your application by writing the name of our brand.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:59 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Food Photography, Photography, Videography, Cooking
Skills: Food Photography, Photography, Videography, Cooking
Country: Lithuania
click to apply

item.title: Making 92 short videos for tik tok, facebook, instagram and youtube shorts - Upwork
item.description:
**Attention Freelancers!**

We invite you to create captivating videos about Meta's innovative new social network, 'Infosha: Find Any Number.'

**About Infosha:**
Infosha allows users to find any phone number by simply entering a name and surname.

**Compensation:**
This project covers the creation and uploading of 92 videos on TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.

**Your Role:**
1. Produce 92 ten-second reel videos about the Infosha App.
2. Offer your unique review, highlighting features like finding famous people’s or friends’ numbers.
3. Create all videos in Georgian.
4. Highlight any preferred King/God subscription benefits.
5. Utilize provided video ideas as needed.
6. Ensure at least 50 of the 92 videos have fun or viral elements to boost interaction.

**Requirements:**
1. Videos must be at least 10 seconds long and in the 9:16 reel format.
2. Post the videos on newly created TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube accounts.
3. No AI voice-overs; we want authentic content.

**Why Join Us:**
1. Be part of promoting a groundbreaking social network.
2. Flexibility in video style creation.
3. Potential for ongoing video production opportunities with impressive work.

**Interested?**
Contact us anytime for questions. Discover the app here: [Infosha on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ktech.infosha&pcampaignid=web_share).

**Key Points:**
1. Infosha is a cutting-edge platform for finding phone numbers (just type a name to find a number).
2. Showcase your creativity and engagement skills.
3. Join a dynamic and innovative project with potential long-term benefits.

We look forward to your unique and engaging contributions!

Budget: $72
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Georgia
click to apply

item.title: Viral Video Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Viral Video Strategist to help us create compelling and shareable video content. As a strategist, you will be responsible for developing and executing effective video marketing campaigns that generate maximum engagement and reach. Your expertise in crafting viral videos will be vital in driving brand awareness and increasing our online presence. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of social media platforms and be knowledgeable about current trends and best practices in video marketing.

  Responsibilities:
  - Develop and implement a viral video strategy to increase brand awareness
  - Create captivating video content that resonates with our target audience
  - Optimize videos for maximum reach and engagement
  - Monitor and analyze video performance metrics to identify areas for improvement

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience in developing viral video campaigns
  - Strong knowledge of social media platforms and video marketing trends
  - Proficient in video editing software and tools
  - Excellent storytelling and creative skills
  - Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities

  This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level strategist who can deliver outstanding results and help us achieve our marketing goals.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:26 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Internet Marketing
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Facebook, Internet Marketing
Country: Ireland
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Automation All Around Editor ☀️ - Upwork
item.description:
We want 16 videos a month, so 4 per week. Our niche will change by the time, but for now we want to focus on the political Niche for now, we want the video's to be exactly like  same quality, so voice over, script and clips/video editing. We will eventually scale up the video's to more, which means you'll earn more as well.

We want a partner that grows with us.

We are seeking a talented and dedicated video content creator to produce high-quality videos for our channel. Initially, our focus will be on the political niche, but this may evolve over time. Here are the details:

Requirements:

Produce 16 videos per month (4 videos per week)
Create content similar in quality and style to https://www.youtube.com/@TheDemocraticNewscaster, including voice-over, scripting, and video editing
Ability to adapt to different niches as our focus changes

What We Offer:

Flexible payment for each video, with the opportunity to earn more as we scale up our video production
A long-term partnership with the potential for growth and increased responsibilities
Ideal Candidate:

Experienced in video production, including voice-over, scripting, and editing
Able to deliver consistent and high-quality content
Flexible and willing to grow with our channel
If you are passionate about creating engaging videos and are looking for a partnership that offers growth opportunities, we would love to hear from you!



Budget: $350
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Excellent Audio And Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an excellent video editor who also have a great ear for audio detail.

We are an audio production company that also edits videos for clients. Those are mainly video podcasts (recorded via Riverside or similar). They need to be colour graded, intro added, and edited to do smooth transitions between cams.

Occassionally we need lower thirds made too.

What is a MUST in this job is an excellent attention to audio quality. We are looking for somebody who is an expert in dealing with bad audio. So please only apply if your skills extend beyond video editing.

The job is flexible (we may have regular clients for you with time but we start small - with one off projects to test you. The better you do - the more work we can add to your plate.


Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Corporate Video, Promotional Video, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Production
Skills: Corporate Video, Promotional Video, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Audio Post Production, Audio Production

item.title: Experienced Podcast Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and experienced video editor to join our team and help us produce high-quality podcast videos. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing podcast episodes into engaging video content for various platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Edit podcast episodes to create visually appealing and engaging video content
- Add graphics, text, and other visual elements to enhance the videos
- Ensure audio and video quality meet our standards
- Collaborate with our team to brainstorm and implement creative ideas for video content

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with podcast videos
- Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and organizational skills

If you are passionate about podcasting and have a keen eye for detail, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $120

item.title: Video Editor for Ecommerce Ad Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are in search of a skilled video editor who can help us edit ecommerce ad videos. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing promotional videos for online platforms. We need someone who can enhance the overall quality of our videos, add engaging transitions and effects, and ensure a seamless flow of visuals and audio. Attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently within tight deadlines is crucial. The project involves editing multiple short videos, each ranging from 30 seconds to 2 minutes.

    Required Skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
    - Ability to enhance video quality and correct color grading
    - Knowledge of adding captions, text overlays, and graphics
    - Familiarity with audio editing and synchronization

    Size: Small
    Duration: Looking for a long-term partnership
    Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 09:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
